thread.title: Fall fashion must-haves from fashion bloggers
thread.title_full: Fall fashion must-haves from fashion bloggers - Chicago Tribune

author: Lauren Hill
title: Fall fashion must-haves from fashion bloggers
text:
Rochelle Johnson, Little Rock, Ark. — Beauticurve.com
72.5K Instagram followers , 793 Twitter followers
Top trend for fall: fringe
Why: "Fringe is cute on the hem of your skirt; it's cute on booties. Fringe bags are also a great accessory."
Rochelle Johnson Rochelle Johnson Rochelle Johnson of Beauticurve.com. Rochelle Johnson of Beauticurve.com. (Rochelle Johnson) Fall must-have: suede biker jacket with fringe from ASOS Curve
Why: "It incorporates the silhouette of a moto jacket while incorporating the beloved fringe. It plays up on the '70s revolution, oh, so well."
Dream piece: a jumbo double flap purse by Chanel
Why: "I'm obsessed, and I need one in black, tan, white and pink. Dream big!"
Anna Baun, Chicago — A Lily Love Affair
26.9K Instagram followers , 1,807 Twitter followers
Top trend for fall: '70s vibe
Why: "Whether it's a great pair of flare jeans or a beautiful chiffon dress in a boho print with OTK boots or booties, this trend is on point this season."
Anna Baun Anna Baun Anna Baun of A Lily Love Affair. Anna Baun of A Lily Love Affair. (Anna Baun) Fall must-have: Over-the-knee boots! Try OTK suede boots from J. Jill or suede boots from Nine West
Why: "Not only do they add a little extra edge and sass to any look, but they are always a great way for us Chicago girls to add that extra layer of warmth to our look while still looking stylish."
Style on a budget: A fedora from Target for $17
Why: "I think every girl needs a great fedora or floppy hat for the season."
Kimberly Pesch, Los Angeles — Eat.Sleep.Wear
197K Instagram followers , 37.5K Twitter followers
Top trend for fall: Overly frayed denim.
Kimberly Pesch Felicia Lasala Photography Kimberly Pesch of Eat.Sleep.Wear. Kimberly Pesch of Eat.Sleep.Wear. (Felicia Lasala Photography) Why: "I am a total denim girl, and this super-frayed look has a very high-end feel to it. Totally changing up that simple jeans and chunky sweater look."
Fall must-have: Saint Laurent Paris ankle boot from Barneys
Why: "I love that there is a little metallic detail to give the boot just the right amount of something to set it apart. Its clean, modern silhouette is the perfect shape to dress up my classic wardrobe pieces."
Fall trend you could live without: '70s flared jeans
Why: "Personally, I feel like they don't compliment my body type, so it's one trend you won't see me rocking. I think that is an important thing about trends — know what looks good on your body and having that drive what you try. Every trend is not for everyone. It's about knowing and loving your body, and rocking what makes you feel amazing."
